title: lucian the grim vs lucian the suave
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/5863e9e2db322b5db1d33f2a8715614c.png
when you compare these two images(and yes i've considered the different lighting and moods) then hot damn!!!!
can lucian look smoking when he smiles. wonder if they'll draw him this handsome after he frees his wife and moved on from his grief 
wish they drew the splash as good as they did this icon
also im a little confused are lucians eyes green or blue?

replies.body: Get you a man who can do both

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Ve1vet,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=09Zn5VB3,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-01-04T18:11:36.663+0000)
>
> Get you a man who can do both

Where and how cause I'd love the guy who did the icon art to do a splash art

that feel when you get your shitty paint copypaste job stolen for another post LOLOL look at that missing 

https://gyazo.com/3aea23d53f7dd2269b4ae4393a9c6570

He will never free his wife from Thresh.  No one escapes the lantern.  All he can do...is join her...in the lantern...and be with her the way he was always meant to.

{{champion:412}} Relax, just let go...

> [{quoted}](name=RAMP Schmidtty,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=09Zn5VB3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-04T14:25:00.039+0000)
>
> He will never free his wife from Thresh.  No one escapes the lantern.  All he can do...is join her...in the lantern...and be with her the way he was always meant to.
> 
> {{champion:412}} Relax, just let go...

Well that's a romantic thought {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

I think Thresh would free his wife if Lucian revealed what he would do with his wife INSIDE the lantern.

I don't think Thresh would be able to stand them if they kept it up for hours on end, being purposely noisy and all that.

> [{quoted}](name=RAMP Schmidtty,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=09Zn5VB3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-04T14:25:00.039+0000)
>
> He will never free his wife from Thresh.  No one escapes the lantern.  All he can do...is join her...in the lantern...and be with her the way he was always meant to.
> 
> {{champion:412}} Relax, just let go...

Thresh, let Senna go, I found you a better alternative. Hopefully you have an extra large lantern somewhere.

https://media.giphy.com/media/13x0GVHma5pOc8/giphy.gif

{{champion:30}} Hold on a second...
*Pulls Senna's soul out of the lantern*
{{champion:236}} ...uh... what are you waiting for?
{{champion:30}} Well, you can't tell me you want her soul back without bringing a vessel!
{{champion:412}} OK, OK, WHAT THE HELL IS GOING ON HERE?!?
{{champion:83}} It wasn't me this time, I swear.
Well the skin is noncanon,so he likely just has blue eyes in the heartseeker universe and green ones in the main one.

And our cries have been answered 
Look at riots new one
https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-g2qxEM50S7w/WG2Ne_Af-3I/AAAAAAAAbSk/WetZ9Y8Lrrg3u4ZJ-wpTV6FdSe1OTQknQCLcB/s1600/C1XXUxnVQAAZsG9.jpg
But damn that was quick 
Goes to show it wasn't an isolated complaint and that generally a lot of people didn't like it before
